services.title: Our Services
services.description: Serving individuals and corporations, covering Tokyo and surrounding areas.
services.svc1Desc: Property viewings, price negotiations, contract reviews, and financing process management.
services.svc2Desc: Multilingual support for international students, foreign professionals, and corporate rentals.
services.svc3Desc: Revenue models, cash flow analysis, M&A and exit strategy proposals.

advantages.title: Why Choose Us
advantages.description: Reliability, expertise, efficiency - our promise to all clients.
advantages.adv1Desc: Convenient subway access, prompt meeting arrangements.
advantages.adv3Desc: Tokyo Governor License (1) No. 112700, transparent and traceable procedures.
advantages.adv4Desc: Data and model-based approach, balanced risk and return.

company.pageSubtitle: Smart Eyes' corporate philosophy, history, and team introduction
company.presidentMessage1: Thank you for your continued support of Smart Eyes. Since our establishment in 2010, we have maintained our 'customer-first' principle and developed real estate business centered in central Tokyo.
company.presidentMessage2: In today's globalizing world, we have built a team with multilingual capabilities and specialized knowledge to meet the needs of customers from diverse backgrounds.
company.presidentMessage3: Real estate is one of life's most important decisions. We are acutely aware of the weight of responsibility in supporting such decisions and strive to always provide services from our customers' perspective.
company.philosophyDescription: The values and principles we cherish
company.missionDesc: We provide specialized services that meet diverse customer needs, creating better living and investment environments through real estate.
company.visionDesc: As a leading company in multilingual real estate services in Tokyo, we serve as a bridge for cross-border real estate transactions.
company.valuesDesc: Based on transparency, expertise, and promptness, we cherish our trust relationship with customers as our most valuable asset.
company.historyDescription: The growth trajectory of Smart Eyes
company.history2021Desc: With great dreams for the future, we established our company. Our challenge in new business fields began.
company.history2022Desc: Actively engaged in international trade business and overseas market development, building a solid international trade network, accumulating rich business operation experience amid globalization, and cultivating sharp market insight and cross-cultural communication skills.
company.history2023Desc: Leveraging years of business experience, we sensitively captured opportunities in the real estate market, began systematic investment in quality real estate projects, and gradually built a diversified real estate investment portfolio.
company.history2024Desc: Carefully managing real estate assets, providing quality living experiences to residents, establishing comprehensive property management systems, and accumulating deep experience in real estate market operations.
company.history2025Desc: Based on years of real estate investment and management experience, we officially launched professional brokerage services, integrated quality property resources, provide comprehensive real estate solutions to customers, aiming to become the most trusted real estate service partner for our clients.
company.teamDescription: A professional group with diverse expertise
company.infoBusinessValue: Real Estate Sales Brokerage, Rental Brokerage, Investment Consulting

properties.pageSubtitle: Introducing premium properties in central Tokyo
properties.categoriesDescription: Find properties according to your purpose
properties.categorySaleDesc: Condominiums, houses, investment properties for customers considering purchase
properties.categoryRentDesc: Rich selection of residential rental properties from studio to family types
properties.categoryInvestmentDesc: High-yield investment properties with detailed analysis reports
properties.areaDescription: Introducing popular areas in central Tokyo
properties.areaShinjukuDesc: Developed as Tokyo's sub-center with excellent transportation convenience. Popular as both business and residential area.
properties.areaShibuyaDesc: Famous as the birthplace of youth culture, where many companies have headquarters. An attractive area where cutting-edge trends and tradition coexist.
properties.areaMinatoDesc: Known as an upscale residential area with many foreign companies and embassies. An area characterized by international atmosphere and sophisticated streetscape.
properties.areaChiyodaDesc: Home to the Imperial Palace and National Diet Building, the center of Japan's politics and economy. A prestigious area where history and modernity blend.
properties.ctaDescription: Our professional staff will responsibly search for properties that meet your requirements. Please feel free to contact us.

contact.pageSubtitle: Please feel free to consult with us
contact.methodsDescription: You can contact us through various methods according to your convenience
contact.methodPhoneDesc: For urgent matters or direct consultation, please feel free to contact us by phone.
contact.methodEmailDesc: Email inquiries are recommended when you need to attach detailed materials or keep records.
contact.methodWechatDesc: WeChat is convenient for consultations in Chinese. Please scan the QR code to add as friend.
contact.methodFormDesc: 24-hour contact form available. You can write detailed content at your leisure.
contact.formDescription: Please fill out the form below and click the send button. We will reply within 2 business days.
contact.formMessagePlaceholder: Example: Budget XX million yen, preferred area (Shinjuku, Shibuya, etc.), floor plan (1LDK, 3LDK, etc.), sales or rental
contact.wechatHint: Scan QR code to add as friend
